div.div: AT LEAST 'GANGNAM STYLE' DIDN'T MAKE IT
Here's a list of the 10 most popular Wikipedia pages in 2012.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YQZw0j&via=Digg&text=Wikipedia's 10 Most-Visited Pages In 2012

div.a: Physicists Explore Why Some Words Become Extinct

div.div: A recent analysis has found that as a language grows over time, it becomes more set in its ways. New words are always being added, according to this study, but few become widely used and part of the standard vocabulary.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TrWVoT&via=Digg&text=Physicists Explore Why Some Words Become Extinct

div.div: A LITTLE LIKE THE 'TAKE ON ME' VIDEO

div.a: What Happens When You Mix Superhero Movies With Their Comic Book Originals?

div.div: It’s easy to forget how much the comic stylings of the 60s and 70s have inspired modern films and just how timeless those two-dimensional, spandex-clad superheroes can be. This series replaces live action with the lines they were born from, interlacing cinematography with storyboard.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VHj82u&via=Digg&text=What Happens When You Mix Superhero Movies With Their Comic Book Originals?

div.div: THE SOLDIERS THAT PROTECT THE SPIES
The CIA’s ability to fend off a second attack in Benghazi provided a glimpse of a key element in the agency’s defensive arsenal: a secret security force created after the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WSJa7a&via=Digg&text=The CIA's Secret Security Force

div.a: Just Got A New iDevice? Here's Where You Can Offload Your Old Crap

div.div: It’s now the day after Christmas, and so you’ve had a full day to play with your new iPad Mini, or some other shiny iDevice, and you’re finally ready to chuck all the ole’, dusty Apple products piling up in the living room.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ViWnDq&via=Digg&text=Just Got A New iDevice? Here's Where You Can Offload Your Old Crap

div.a: Race Against Time To Build A New Tomb For Chernobyl

div.div: It looks like a typical unfinished construction site, ringed by dirt, with scaffolding against a wall. But the job of entombing Chernobyl is unlike any other.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WW7Lbf&via=Digg&text=Race Against Time To Build A New Tomb For Chernobyl

div.a: How The Heirs Of Mao’s Comrades Became Capitalist Nobility

div.div: Bloomberg News mapped the families of Communist China’s “Eight Immortals” to reveal the origins of princelings, an elite class that has been able to amass wealth and influence, and exploit opportunities unavailable to most Chinese.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12Pyea0&via=Digg&text=How The Heirs Of Mao’s Comrades Became Capitalist Nobility

div.a: Random People Are Screaming At Matt Lauer Over Ann Curry Firing

div.div: Matt Lauer is "freaked out" that people -- and lots of them -- have been screaming at him on the streets of Manhattan, calling him names and blaming him for the demise of Ann Curry.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uw3wAH&via=Digg&text=Random People Are Screaming At Matt Lauer Over Ann Curry Firing

div.a: How Much People Are Spending On Wedding Proposals

div.div: If you plan to propose this holiday season, as an early engagement gift to you, we’ve looked into the costs of some of the most elaborate proposals out there–as well as the best post-proposal financial practices.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RijJc8&via=Digg&text=How Much People Are Spending On Wedding Proposals

div.div: LIKE A DOG WITH A BONE

div.a: The Most Persistent People On OkCupid

div.div: Badgering women with multiple messages is not the way to get yourself a date.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YQwnCp&via=Digg&text=The Most Persistent People On OkCupid

div.a: Five-Year-Old Boy Finds Porn On His New Nintendo 3DS

div.div: Wednesday morning Mark Giles' five-year-old son Braydon was playing with his Nintendo 3DS, a gift he had been asking Santa for since last year.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VBIV9A&via=Digg&text=Five-Year-Old Boy Finds Porn On His New Nintendo 3DS

div.a: Foxconn Responds To Bad PR By Giving Assembly Line Workers Chairs

div.div: After the hardships of workers in China’s electronics factories were exposed to a global audience, working conditions have changed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12GHi1M&via=Digg&text=Foxconn Responds To Bad PR By Giving Assembly Line Workers Chairs

div.a: What Are The Year's Most Annoying Words?

div.div: So you find certain words annoying? Whatever.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YljHPf&via=Digg&text=What Are The Year's Most Annoying Words?

div.a: The Soviet Union's Version Of 'The Hobbit'

div.div: Yes, the Soviet Union made their own version of 'The Hobbit,' and predictably it's amazing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZmYjiD&via=Digg&text=The Soviet Union's Version Of 'The Hobbit'

div.div: This 'Doctor Who' infographic charts the history of the show from 1963 through 2011.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ViLQIv&via=Digg&text=50 Years Of 'Doctor Who'

div.a: Asparagus Prevents Hangovers, Incredibly Useful Study Finds

div.div: It's the holidays, so maybe you've been drinking too much. And maybe you've been dealing with a few too many hangovers. But no more. Just stuff some asparagus in your pocket and enjoy your New Year's Eve.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZAH4ue&via=Digg&text=Asparagus Prevents Hangovers, Incredibly Useful Study Finds

div.a: 'Potential Prostitutes' Site Lets Users Label Women As Prostitutes, Charges 'Removal' Fees

div.div: Potential Prostitutes is only the latest sleazy site to wed personal photos to public humiliation. Its offer to publicize anonymous claims of sex crimes, however, is a novelty: any woman may be be anonymously tagged as a prostitute, then targeted with hefty removal fees.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WK5Qmh&via=Digg&text='Potential Prostitutes' Site Lets Users Label Women As Prostitutes, Charges 'Removal' Fees

div.a: Apple Rumored To Be Working On An iOS-Enabled Watch

div.div: Long before Apple ever revealed its latest iPhones and iPads to the public, we knew almost exactly what they would look like and what kind of features they would have thanks to rumors emanating from Apple's Asian supply chain. Now similar sources are gossiping about a new Apple product.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V6MUN9&via=Digg&text=Apple Rumored To Be Working On An iOS-Enabled Watch

div.a: How Often Do We Use Guns In Self-Defense?

div.div: The validity of the NRA's stand depends on how often Americans actually use guns in self-defense.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RUcFE2&via=Digg&text=How Often Do We Use Guns In Self-Defense?

div.a: This Man Ate Chinese Soup So Spicy It Burned A Hole In His Stomach

div.div: Doctors at a hospital in China were perplexed when a 26-year-old-man with no history of gastrointestinal disorders ended up in their emergency room after eating soup so spicy it apparently opened up a hole in the wall of his stomach.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TAgQFt&via=Digg&text=This Man Ate Chinese Soup So Spicy It Burned A Hole In His Stomach

div.a: Who Are Hollywood's Most Bankable Actors?

div.div: Although studios often spend hundreds of millions of dollars on blockbusters full of explosions and computer-generated destruction, a small movie like Black Swan can often be a much better bet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rifux6&via=Digg&text=Who Are Hollywood's Most Bankable Actors?

div.a: What Cities Would Look Like Without Light Pollution

div.div: Have you ever wondered what the night sky might look like with all the city and street lights turned off?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10lAkzD&via=Digg&text=What Cities Would Look Like Without Light Pollution

div.a: What It Actually Feels Like To Freeze To Death

div.div: The cold hard facts of freezing to death.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/oZe62f&via=Digg&text=What It Actually Feels Like To Freeze To Death

div.a: What Happens When You Are The Doctor On The Airplane

div.div: This is what happens when a flight attendant asks, "Is there a doctor on the plane?"

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RjK9du&via=Digg&text=What Happens When You Are The Doctor On The Airplane

div.a: Photos From The Fall Of The Soviet Union

div.div: Here are some pictures taken by photographers who visited Russia between 1990 and 1991 as the Soviet Union fell apart.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZufYoK&via=Digg&text=Photos From The Fall Of The Soviet Union

div.a: Petition To Classify Westboro Baptist Church As Hate Group Becomes Most Popular Ever

div.div: Users of the White House's "We the People" digital petition platform have flooded the site in support of an effort to officially designate the Kansas-based Westboro Baptist Church as a hate group.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Utzwp6&via=Digg&text=Petition To Classify Westboro Baptist Church As Hate Group Becomes Most Popular Ever

div.a: 'Looper' Director On The Toughest Scene He Wrote

div.div: It's the obvious one: the diner scene between Bruce and Joe, which is almost like its own little movie wedged into the middle of a bigger movie.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WuGRDq&via=Digg&text='Looper' Director On The Toughest Scene He Wrote

div.a: When You Should (And Shouldn't) Buy AppleCare

div.div: You get a year of AppleCare as part of any purchase—but do you need to pay for more time under Apple's guaranteed protection? The truth is, it depends on what you're buying to begin with.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VioH9c&via=Digg&text=When You Should (And Shouldn't) Buy AppleCare

div.a: Chinese Worker Hides Plea For Help In Box Of Halloween Decorations

div.div: The letter came in a box of Halloween decorations purchased at Kmart, but for a year Julie Keith never knew. It gathered dust in her storage, a haunting plea for help hidden among artificial skeletons, tombstones and spider webs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RMNSSi&via=Digg&text=Chinese Worker Hides Plea For Help In Box Of Halloween Decorations

div.a: The Craziest Tales Of Sex Gone Bad In Florida

div.div: Floridians have been called every name. Crazy. Crackers. Loco. Too stupid to vote correctly. Blue hairs. Rednecks. Carpetbaggers. Half-baked. In the sun too long. They say we live in a Banana Republic. Call us anything you'd like. However, never ever call us sexually unadventurous.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YOtYby&via=Digg&text=The Craziest Tales Of Sex Gone Bad In Florida
